name: EML to MBOX Conversion
short_description: EML and MBOX both are popular email format among home or organization users but conversion of EML to MBOX is not possible due to different email format. Only external utility can help to copy eml emails of Windows Live Mail, Vista Mail, Outlook Express to MBOX in Thunderbird, Mac Apple Mail, Entourage, Eudora, etc. after seeing this circumstance, EML to MBOX Converter has been created for users to achieve entire eml files into MBOX. The program can convert Windows Live Mail, Outlook Express or Windows Vista Mail into Mac Mai, Thunderbird, Entourage, Eudora, without any data loss. http://www.emltombox.org/export-windows-mail-to-thunderbird.html
summary: Perfect EML to MBOX Conversion with Ultimate EML to MBOX Converter
